Text.Language: Pip~neuma m~parakl/ton: e~tafi~ e~pec/t e~bol qen t~ve: afouwnh e~jen nia~poctoloc: qen p~sai n~]pent/koct/.
The Spirit of comfort who came down from heaven, appeared on the Apostles, on the feast of Pentecost.
الروح المعزى الذى نزل من السماء، ظهر على الرسل فى عيد البنطيتقسطى.
Afmahou e~bolqen ka] niben: nem covia~ niben: qen ] exoucia~ n~te tefjom.
He filled them with every understanding and every wisdom in the authority of His power.
ملأهم من كل فهم وكل حكمة بسلطان قوته.
Enws e~bol enjw m~moc: je w~ Pen[oic I/#c# P,#c#.
We cry out saying, O our Lord Jesus Christ.
نصرخ قائلين يا ربنا يسوع المسيح
V/etafsenaf e~p~swi e~niv/oui: afhemci caoui nam m~pefiwt: afouwrp nan m~piparakl/ton: Pip~neuma n~te ]meym/i:
Who ascended into the heavens, sat at the right of His Father, sent to us the Paraclete, the Spirit of truth.
الذي صعد الى السموات وجلس عن يمين ابيه و أرسل البارقليط روح الحق.
Save us and have mercy on us.
